title: Who is a famous music producer in India? - Quora

response.answer_text: A lot of actually but the most famous Indian musical maestro is A.R. Rahman. He has been beknighted by two oscars and numerous other awards. Youmay also wanna check out the followingmusical duos: Vishal ShekharSajid WajidAnu Malik.Amaal Malik.Ankit Tiwari.
